original: 徐州沛縣人，劉備夫人，劉禪生母。後世編撰的地方志稱其名為梅。劉備在小沛時，納甘氏為妾室。因劉備前後幾任正妻都逝世或失散，而被尊為夫人。
text: Born in Peixian County, Xuzhou, Mrs. Liu Bei, mother of Liu Chan. The local chronicles compiled by later generations called it Mei. When Liu Bei was in Xiaopei, Nagan was the concubine room. Because Liu Bei's wife had passed away or separated, she was revered as his wife.
